name: aws-serverless-ai-stories
description: Example AWS Serverless application using ChatGPT and DALL-E to generate children stories on cron jobs

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm i && cd ../backend && npm i && cd src/create-story && npm i && cd ../generate-audio-for-story && npm i && cd ../generate-images-for-story && npm i && cd ../web-api && npm i
